__e: Look, Sally, there's a very specific kind of person who's relieved when death finally comes.
We are on a special order... to find out what exactly occured... when your uncle was murdered.
And unless there is something specific... in what could help him--
And there's nothing greater in life than having something specific to say at a general.
How is that not specific to one of you?
So, unless there's something... specific that you can tell me, there's very little that I can do.
Well, I could just say that I don't like you, But that's not really specific enough, And this is all about specifics, isn't it?
